company_description: Welcome to digital manufacturing rapid prototyping and on-demand production in as fast as 1 day!

title: Data Engineer - PowerBI
description:
Data Engineer - PowerBI**At a glance**
---------------


Are you passionate about working with financial data, do you have hands-on experience with reporting, and do you want to help us build a finance domain data store? Then we believe we have a great opportunity for you.


We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team. At the moment 18 professionals are working together from different expertise areas to create high quality data marts and reports.

**Your job**
------------


We are looking for a data engineer with passion, overview and technical skills with a focus on Power BI. As a member of a DevOps team you are responsible for development but also daily operations. In a short period of time you are able to obtain extensive knowledge of our large and complex data models to be able to make the necessary future changes, support production or to support new requirements.


Within the team, you'll be involved in the implementation of Power BI reports in close contact with the stakeholders and data engineers, refine user stories, investigate data using SQL on Databricks, designing the data model, configuration and deployment to Azure Power BI service. It's definitely a plus if you have experience with all of these technologies, but also be eager to learn new skills.


Your ability and willingness to work with others is crucial for your success in this role. You are naturally someone who takes initiative, structures and organises work well and is keen to work with others to deliver tangible results. You are practical, have an analytical approach and good communication skills. You are a strong team player and you take responsibility for your work. In the dynamic environment in which you operate, you have the ability to get all stakeholders on board.

**Working environment**
-----------------------


You will be working as a Data Engineer within the finance domain with a focus on reporting in a dynamic and energetic team of professionals who all are critical thinkers and share the same passion. We are ambitious and learning every day. We offer an exciting and dynamic work environment with many opportunities for innovation. We provide personal development opportunities and encourage co-working with stakeholders to come up with the best solutions for their needs.

**Your profile**
----------------


You are up to date with the latest developments in data engineering and Power BI. The job requires excellent analytical skills and an eye for detail.

* You have an affinity with financial reporting
* Strong analytic skills, data analytics, (pre)processing, and data handling
* Certified PL-300 (must)
* Expertise Power BI and SQL (must)
* Experience in data modelling and Kimball methodology (must)
* Experience with data management, data governance and DQ
* Experience in Azure Databricks
* Experience in stakeholder management
* Experience with Azure DevOps, Boards, Git repositories, Pipelines
* Pro-active attitude and an excellent team player.
* You are at least AZ-900 certified or willing to pass within 3 month.
**We are offering**
-------------------

* The gross monthly salary displayed above is based on a 36-hour work week, including vacation pay and benefit budget.
* The Benefit Budget is 11% of your salary. The Benefit Budget allows you to acquire additional employment benefits. If you make no purchases or reservations in the Benefit Shop in a given month, you are paid one twelfth of your Benefit Budget that month.
* Five weeks of vacation per year. You have the option to purchase an additional four weeks per year.
* Personal development Budget of € 1,000 per year, which you can accumulate up to € 3,000.
* Possibility to work from home (in consultation with your team and depending on your position).
* An annual public transport pass with free public transportation throughout the Netherlands.
* An excellent pension scheme.
**Interested?**
---------------


If you find this vacancy interesting and it fits your expectations and qualifications, you can apply online. If you have questions, please contact marc.veldt@nl.abnamro.com (Chapter Lead)

**Equal opportunities for all**
-------------------------------


The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

**Disclaimer external recruitment agencies**
--------------------------------------------


External recruitment agencies need to have a signed agreement with ABN AMRO BANK N.V., executed by a Talent Acquisition Specialist, when submitting a resume to a vacancy. In addition, a recruitment agency can only submit a resume when invited by a Talent Acquisition Specialist to join the search for a right candidate. All unsolicited resumes sent to us will be considered property of ABN AMRO BANK N.V. In this case, ABN AMRO will not be held liable to pay a placement fee.

### **Wij vragen**

* Samenwerkingsgerichtheid
* Passie voor je vakgebied
company_description: Bij ABN AMRO hebben we een duidelijke purpose: Banking for better, for generations to come. Samen met onze klanten gaan we de uitdagingen van onze tijd aan en geven we vorm aan de toekomst.

title: Data Engineer Azure SQL
description:
Data Engineer Azure SQL**At a glance**
---------------


Are you passionate about working with financial data, do you have hands-on experience with data engineering techniques, and do you want to help us build great data driven applications for our stakeholders? Then we believe we have a great opportunity for you.


We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team. At the moment 8 professionals are working together from different expertise areas to create high quality data solutions and reports.

**Your job**
------------


We are looking for a data engineer with passion, overview and technical skills. As a member of a DevOps team you are responsible for development but also daily operations. In a short period of time you are able to obtain extensive knowledge of our large and complex data models to be able to make the necessary future changes, support production or to support new requirements.


You will be working together with a focused team on implementing and improving our data-driven solutions, working with Power BI, Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Server and Azure DevOps.  

Within the team, you'll be involved in the implementation of data marts, ETL in close contact with the stakeholders, designing the data model but also Azure Infrastructure and Azure Pipelines.  

It's definitely a plus if you have experience with all of these technologies, but also be eager to learn new skills.

**Working environment**
-----------------------


You will be working as a Data Engineer within the finance domain in a dynamic and energetic team of professionals who all are critical thinkers and share the same passion. We are ambitious and learning every day. We offer an exciting and dynamic work environment with many opportunities for innovation. We provide personal development opportunities and encourage co-working with stakeholders to come up with the best solutions for their needs.

**Your profile**
----------------


You are up to date with the latest developments in data engineering. The job requires excellent analytical skills and an eye for detail.

* You have an affinity with financial reporting
* Strong analytic skills, data analytics and data handling
* Conceptional thinking and functional overview
* Expertise in Azure SQL Database, Azure Data Factory and SQL (must)
* Experience handling structured datasets (must)
* Experience in data modelling and Kimball methodology (must)
* Experience with Visual Studio Database projects (must)
* Experience in stakeholder management
* Experience with Azure DevOps, Boards, Git repositories, Pipelines
* Experience with data management, data governance, DQ, and meta data
* Pro-active attitude and an excellent team player.
* You are at least AZ-900 certified or willing to pass within 3 month.
**We are offering**
-------------------

* The gross monthly salary displayed above is based on a 36-hour work week, including vacation pay and benefit budget.
* The Benefit Budget is 11% of your salary. The Benefit Budget allows you to acquire additional employment benefits. If you make no purchases or reservations in the Benefit Shop in a given month, you are paid one twelfth of your Benefit Budget that month.
* Five weeks of vacation per year. You have the option to purchase an additional four weeks per year.
* Personal development Budget of € 1,000 per year, which you can accumulate up to € 3,000.
* Possibility to work from home (in consultation with your team and depending on your position).
* An annual public transport pass with free public transportation throughout the Netherlands.
* An excellent pension scheme.
**Interested?**
---------------


If you find this vacancy interesting and it fits your expectations and qualifications, you can apply online. If you have questions, please contact marc.veldt@nl.abnamro.com (Chapter Lead)

**Equal opportunities for all**
-------------------------------


The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

**Disclaimer external recruitment agencies**
--------------------------------------------


External recruitment agencies need to have a signed agreement with ABN AMRO BANK N.V., executed by a Talent Acquisition Specialist, when submitting a resume to a vacancy. In addition, a recruitment agency can only submit a resume when invited by a Talent Acquisition Specialist to join the search for a right candidate. All unsolicited resumes sent to us will be considered property of ABN AMRO BANK N.V. In this case, ABN AMRO will not be held liable to pay a placement fee.

### **Wij vragen**

* Samenwerkingsgerichtheid
* Passie voor je vakgebied

title: Data Engineer - Azure Databricks
description:
Data Engineer - Azure Databricks**At a glance**
---------------


Are you passionate about working with financial data, do you have hands-on experience with data engineering techniques, and do you want to help us build a finance domain data store? Then we believe we have a great opportunity for you.


We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team. At the moment 18 professionals are working together from different expertise areas to create high quality data marts and reports.

**Your job**
------------


We are looking for a data engineer with passion, overview and technical skills. As a member of a DevOps team you are responsible for development but also daily operations. In a short period of time you are able to obtain extensive knowledge of our large and complex data models to be able to make the necessary future changes, support production or to support new requirements.


Additionally, you can help existing data engineers with challenges in Databricks by using PySpark and SQL and implement business requirements.


Your ability and willingness to work with others is crucial for your success in this role. You are naturally someone who takes initiative, structures and organises work well and is keen to work with others to deliver tangible results. You are practical, have an analytical approach and good communication skills. You are a strong team player and you take responsibility for your work. In the dynamic environment in which you operate, you have the ability to get all stakeholders on board.

**Working environment**
-----------------------


You will be working as a Data Engineer within the finance domain in a dynamic and energetic team of professionals who all are critical thinkers and share the same passion. We are ambitious and learning every day. We offer an exciting and dynamic work environment with many opportunities for innovation. We provide personal development opportunities and encourage co-working with stakeholders to come up with the best solutions for their needs.

**Your profile**
----------------


You are up to date with the latest developments in data engineering and Databricks. The job requires excellent analytical skills and an eye for detail.

* You have an affinity with financial reporting
* Strong analytic skills, data analytics, (pre)processing, and data handling
* Expertise in Azure Databricks, Python, PySpark and SQL (must)
* Experience handling structured and unstructured datasets (must)
* Experience in data modelling and Kimball methodology (must)
* Experience in stakeholder management
* Experience with Azure DevOps, Boards, Git repositories, Pipelines
* Experience with data management, data governance, DQ, and meta data
* Pro-active attitude and an excellent team player.
* You are at least AZ-900 certified or willing to pass within 3 month.
**We are offering**
-------------------

* The opportunity to develop yourself on hard as well as soft skills.
* A good work-life balance
* The opportunity to be the best you can be, work flexible hours and lots of room to grow both personally and professionally
* A hybrid way of working
* A salary ranging from 4345.- to 6207.- per month based on a 36-hour workweek and a seniority level
* A supplementary benefit budget of 11%, which you can spend on additional fringe benefits
* A personal development budget of EUR 1.000 per year
* An annual public transportation pass
* A solid pension plan
**Interested?**
---------------


If you find this vacancy interesting and it fits your expectations and qualifications, you can apply online. If you have questions, please contact marc.veldt@nl.abnamro.com (Chapter Lead)

**Equal opportunities for all**
-------------------------------


The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

**Disclaimer external recruitment agencies**
--------------------------------------------


External recruitment agencies need to have a signed agreement with ABN AMRO BANK N.V., executed by a Talent Acquisition Specialist, when submitting a resume to a vacancy. In addition, a recruitment agency can only submit a resume when invited by a Talent Acquisition Specialist to join the search for a right candidate. All unsolicited resumes sent to us will be considered property of ABN AMRO BANK N.V. In this case, ABN AMRO will not be held liable to pay a placement fee.

### **Wij vragen**

* Samenwerkingsgerichtheid
* Passie voor je vakgebied

title: People Strategy Consultant - Junior
description:
At Effectory we help organizations to perform better through employee feedback, fostering a people-centric approach to reaching their goals. As a People Strategy Consultant, your primary focus is to connect employee listening activities with customers' HR and business strategies and help them drive organizational change through valuable insights.  



  

Your role begins by collaborating with customers to establish an effective employee listening strategy tailored to their specific business context. Once insights are gathered, you will analyze employee feedback data, present the findings customers, and provide actionable recommendations to address their organizational development challenges. Your expertise will also guide customers on how to leverage employee feedback as a tool for dialogue and enabling change within their organization. Additionally, there is a commercial aspect to the role; you will advice customers on additional services and feedback solutions through consultative selling.

  

In this role, you will have a unique opportunity to continuously enhance your expertise in organizational development. By consistently expanding your knowledge in the field of human capital, you will actively share your valuable expertise with colleagues, customers, and external networks, further solidifying our position as industry leaders.  



  

  

You are a professional or consultant with up to **two years of experience** and you have overall knowledge of the Human Capital space (such as organizational development, leadership, change management, health & well-being).  



  

Next to that:


* A university bachelor’s or master’s degree, preferably in a related field such as HR, Business Administration or (Occupational) Psychology is a **must**.
* Fluency in Dutch & English is a **must**.
* You are excited about working with customers and you love presenting.
* You like to think strategically and have business acumen.
* You are great at problem solving.
* With your stellar communication skills, you know how to deliver a message in a clear and engaging manner.
* With your commercial talents, you confidently advise customers additional services and solutions.
* You like to work in a team while having a high degree of autonomy.
* You are available for at least 32 hours per week.

 **THIS IS US**


Effectory is Europe’s leading employee feedback solution. With our platform, HR and management we collect employee feedback throughout the employee journey. This feedback is transformed into people analytics that informs strategies to boost productivity, engagement and retention. Built on 25 years’ experience, our 200 specialists in Amsterdam and Munich support more than 1,200 organizations in 110 countries. Now more than ever, HR is an integral part of business strategy, which is why our feedback solution is tailor-made for strategic HR.  



  

**Effecto****ry’s mission**

We are dedicated to improving the working world by giving employees a voice and making sure their feedback has an impact. Our experts work with HR teams and managers around the world, using employee feedback to overcome some of their biggest people-oriented challenges. From software engineers to HR specialists, every day Effectory’s people work to improve the working world, and we are looking for talented individuals who also want to be part of this mission.  



  

**THIS IS WHAT WE OFFER**


* Competitive salary (the *range for this position is around:* *€ 40.000 - € 45.000 gross* *a year, depending on your experience).*
* Annual bonus scheme.
* 25 holidays for FTEs, and flexible public holiday options.
* A fun and interactive onboarding program to get to know our company and some of your new colleagues.
* A learning budget to spend on your own personal development. We also provide professional and personal development opportunities, and also organize yearly summer and winter schools.
* Flexible working: you will be able to work max 60% of your contract hours from home (or any other location in the Netherlands and/or Germany).
* Budget to set up your home office.
* Yearly Body & Mind budget to spend on anything that energizes (or relaxes) you.
* Annual events, such as our Christmas party, summer party & the legendary Big Day.
* Additional monthly compensation for working from home.
* The option to work abroad for up to 4 months, and to take an unpaid sabbatical.
* You get your birthday off work and can also take a day to volunteer for a cause of your choice.
*We are looking for 2 People Strategy Consultants. Ideally you will start together on the* *1**st* *of September.*  



  

**THIS IS HOW IT WORKS**


1. *You want this job*: submit your application via the link below


2. *We are intrigued*: we make a phone call to further introduce yourself and ask questions


3. *We all think it went well*: we now meet live (or in a video call) to get to know each other a bit better


4. *We like each other even more*: you meet potential team members and get a bit of a pleasant grilling


5. *We want to see you in action*: you complete a case/assessment



6. *The final hurdle*: we agree on terms & conditions, we sign, and you start!
company_description: At Effectory, we understand the power of both technology and human connection.

title: Senior Fullstack Software Engineer - React
description:
#### **Join Lepaya!**


Lepaya seeks an experienced Fullstack Software Engineer to join our Client Intelligence Squad in our mission to make L&D professionals more productive and effective in delivering business impact. To achieve that you will work on projects such as intelligence to recommend training modules to clients and analytics to assess learning impact.


You will positively impact our users' lives by leading the product delivery by planning, designing, and implementing high-quality software. In addition to new features, you will also be responsible for maintaining and refactoring legacy code when applicable, by writing flexible, efficient, and clean code that is well-tested.


If you are a proactive Senior Software Engineer and are looking for an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact, we invite you to apply and join our growing team at Lepaya!

### **What you’ll bring**

* 5+ years of experience developing robust production-level web applications, preferably B2B


	+ Proven backend experience with Node.js and TypeScript and have over 3 years of experience with React and feel confident using them
* Strong background in automated testing (preferably Jest)
* Fluent in English, with clear, effective communication tailored to the audience, ensuring mutual understanding
* Team player, who excels at cross-functional collaboration, with a track record of a positive solution-oriented mindset, ownership, and leadership

### **Your first-year achievements**

* You will develop high-quality, scalable software aligned with our strategic goals, operating within a product squad targeting the client persona (Learning and Development leader)
* You'll work across the stack with TypeScript, NestJS, React, PostgreSQL and Terraform. We rely on AWS to host our infrastructure
* By keeping updated with industry trends and technologies, you will elevate our client experience and contribute to your team’s development
* Advocate for improving our processes, product quality, security, and performance

### **Why you’ll love this journey at Lepaya**

* A challenging role in a vibrant international scale-up
* Our work-to-live scheme, which prioritizes health and wellbeing
* Unlimited holidays and Lepaya Fridays – every other Friday, a day for yourself
* Flexible hours and a hybrid working arrangement, we expect you to work from our office at least 2 days a week
* Work from anywhere for 8 weeks/year
* 500 euros to set up your home office and a monthly WFH allowance of 35 euros
* Unlimited access to OpenUp and 500 euros per year to be used on Empowr, our psychological & well-being partners
* Fun activities where you can interact with colleagues, such as Ski trips, team meetings, lunches, and many more!
* Lots of opportunities to learn and grow, including internal career development:


	+ Access to our Lepaya Academy to help you upskill
	+ An internal hiring program to help you advance

### **Our mission**


At Lepaya, we transform professional development by redefining how organizations nurture their talent through Power Skills—vital abilities shaped by market demands. Using a blend of human expertise and AI, our capability platform maximizes employee potential. With nearly 1 million individuals upskilled in companies like Dell and L’Oreal, and $80 million in funding, we pioneer advanced learning integrated into daily workflows. Join our global, fast-growing team as we aim to be the largest upskilling platform worldwide!

### **What does it mean to be a Lepayaan?**


We succeed together. We act and come up with solutions. We build for growth. We exceed expectations. We create meaningful impact. For a glimpse into our culture, explore our careers page.

### **How we live DE&I**


At Lepaya, our diverse team embraces professionals of all backgrounds. We prioritize an inclusive environment where every member is valued and empowered. We're dedicated to diversity, equity, and inclusion through initiatives like our Diversity Charter and internal DE&I team. Your unique perspective is celebrated, ensuring you feel supported and encouraged to be yourself at work.

### **What’s next?**


Ensuring that your candidate journey is smooth is our top priority! Here's a sneak peek into our standard hiring process: First, an introductory interview; then, a chat with the hiring manager; followed by a technical interview or a business case; a chance to meet our founder; and finally, an offer! We're all about getting to know you better, so we'll invite you to our office for a face-to-face stage, where you can meet potential future colleagues and experience our awesome office vibes firsthand!

title: Data analyst HR Huizen (32-40 uur)
description:
**Samenvatting**
----------------



Iedere dag nemen we op basis van data beslissingen over onze organisatie en medewerkers. Om dit proces zo makkelijk mogelijk te maken voor onze stakeholders, stellen we terugkerende en eenmalige rapportages met waardevolle inzichten beschikbaar over onder andere onze formatie, personeelskosten, ziekteverzuim en medewerkerstevredenheid. Als reporting analyst HR creëer, onderhoud en vernieuw je deze rapportages.


We zijn op zoek naar een nieuwe data/reporting analyst voor ons HR Reporting team. Samen met het team maken we de meest waardevolle inzichten tijdig beschikbaar voor onze stakeholders. Jouw leidinggevende is de team lead HR Reporting, en je werkt in het team samen met een analytics business partner en een data engineer. De stakeholders zijn ons HR management team, managers HR, HR business partners en leidinggevenden in de lijn.

**Wat ga je doen?**
-------------------


* Je creëert dashboards en overzichten over onze organisatie en medewerkers op basis van data uit verschillende HR-systemen.
* Je haalt feedback op bij onze stakeholders over bestaande dashboards en denkt mee over nieuwe verzoeken die zij hebben.
* Je communiceert met onze stakeholders over nieuwe dashboards en wijzigingen in bestaande dashboards.
* Als er nog geen automatisch ETL proces bestaat, verzamel je data uit HR-systemen.
* Je voorziet andere afdelingen van HR-data.
* Samen met de analytics business partner en data engineer denk je na over de beste oplossing voor de behoefte aan data van onze stakeholders.
* Je denkt met het team mee over de toekomst van people analytics binnen Lidl.
**Wie ben jij?**
----------------


* Je hebt aantoonbare ervaring in het werken met data en het creëren van inzichten op basis van deze data.
* Je hebt ervaring of affiniteit met HR-, recruitment- en payroll-processen. Dit helpt je om inzichten te creëren die aansluiten bij de behoeften van de stakeholders.
* Je hebt een afgeronde hbo-opleiding.
* Je gaat voor eenvoud in dashboards en begrijpt het onderscheid tussen data en een inzicht.
* Graag werk je in Excel en je hebt hier veel ervaring mee. Ervaring met Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) is een absolute pre.
* Je bent analytisch sterk, werkt accuraat en bekijkt bestaande dashboards kritisch.
* Je krijgt energie van gesprekken met de stakeholders over dashboards, data en inzichten.
* Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal is vereist (Excellent Dutch language skills are required).
**Wat krijg jij van ons?**
--------------------------


* Een uitdagende, zelfstandige rol in een enthousiast team binnen een internationale omgeving die continu in beweging is.
* De ruimte om jezelf te verbeteren en uit te dagen. We hechten veel waarde aan persoonlijke ontwikkeling.
* Een gedegen inwerktraject waarin we je uitgebreid laten kennismaken met onze organisatie, processen, cultuur en mensen.
* De mogelijkheid om zowel thuis als op kantoor te kunnen werken.
* Goede arbeidsvoorwaarden, waaronder een goed salaris en leuke extra’s zoals sporten met korting en een goede lunch voor een Lidl-prijsje.
* Een baan bij de beste retail-werkgever van Nederland in de Top Employer-ranking.
**Interesse?**
--------------



We kijken uit naar jouw sollicitatie! Mocht je vragen hebben naar aanleiding van deze vacature dan kun je contact opnemen met onze recruiter Christian Venus via christian.venus@lidl.nl of 06-30 35 90 06. Wil je direct solliciteren? Klik hieronder op solliciteer nu! en stuur jouw cv en motivatiebrief meteen naar de recruiter.


*Dit betreft een vacature voor een interne rol. Reacties van ZZP’ers, uitzend-, detacherings-, werving- en selectiebureaus stellen we niet op prijs.*

title: Mechanical and Chemical Engineering Intern
description:
Eindhoven, Netherlands
Category
 Research & Development
Posted Date
 06/17/2024
Job Id
 350784
  
We’re looking for an intern to join our digital research team in Eindhoven to support the development of 3D-printed tools for prototyping our luminaire components.


Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.


As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!


Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with our engineering team to design and develop 3D-printed tools for prototyping lamp shades and parts.
* Gain hands-on experience in additive manufacturing techniques, material selection, and process optimization.
* Work closely with senior engineers to troubleshoot and improve existing designs.
* Conduct research on innovative materials and technologies for 3D printing applications.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering, chemical engineering, or a related field.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD) is a plus.
* Enthusiasm for learning and contributing to cutting-edge projects.

**What You’ll Learn:**

* Advanced 3D printing techniques and their applications.
* Material properties and their impact on design.
* Prototyping methodologies for lamp shades and related components.

**Perks:**

* Competitive working, travel and/or housing allowance.
* Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
* Opportunity to work with experienced professionals in the field.


Our candidate profile is just a guide, we welcome candidates from a variety of diverse backgrounds and unique attributes to apply for this position!

**What you’ll get in return…**


We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.


See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

title: INTERIM-OPDRACHT: HRM Program Manager
description:
**Job description**
-------------------

**What will you be doing as a HRM Program manager**  

  

Organizational wide the SQUAD (Support QUAlity Drive) was started at TU/e and has now reached completion for the Human Resource Management (HRM) department. The SQUAD program was a TU/e wide program aimed at improving the quality of internal services. All support services go through this program at different times. The HRM department has gone through this complete program and is going to start the implementation. This implementation includes a multi-year change program in which an important role is reserved for "the basics in order", more efficiency by standardization of processes and standardization of services.


The HRM Program Manager will play a key role, in making the changes we want to implement in the HRM department concrete and happening. The transformation plan describes our ambition to standardize our service with the purpose to be efficient and cost effective. Next to this we want to give a strong focus to several employee journeys, like onboarding and leadership. The purpose of this ambitious transformation plan is to provide our TU/e leaders and employees with solid HR service to allow them to give focus on their core activities and with that we create together a strong TU/e organization.


As HRM Program Manager, you will drive and oversee the program's execution. You will manage the program daily, coordinating with project leaders and other stakeholders and with support of the core team. You take action to ensure the implementation stays on track. The HRM Management Team acts as the Steering Committee. You report and are accountable to the Steering Committee and the HRM Board. This board (also exciting of members of the Executive Committee) sets the strategic HR agenda and priorities.


**About the Human Resource Management department**


The Human Resources Management (HRM) department has over 115 colleagues and consists of three departments: HR Business, HR Operations and HR Development. The HR Business teams focuses on supporting people management in the faculties and services specifically through HR consulting and recruitment. The HR Development teams focus on policy-making, HR analytics, staff development support and project management. Within the HR Operations Department, in addition to the HR Services team, the following four other teams operate: Payroll Administration, Staff Immigration (work related to immigration procedures), Compliance, Compensation and Benefits, and Occupational Health, Safety, Environment & Radiation Protection.


The HRM department has the ambition to be a solid HR department. We work with dedication on our tasks like realizing a smooth HR operations, talent attraction and HR advisory process, and on next to policy and projects like diversity and inclusion, well-being & social safety, talent, leadership, and career development.


**Job requirements**
--------------------


Are you excited about this challenge? Great! If the following points match your experience, ambition, and profile, we’d love to hear from you!


* You have an academic working and thinking level, with relevant work experience and education in the HRM domain;
* Experienced in program management, preferably in combination with spot on education;
* You are a seasoned leader, familiar in working with dedicated professionals;
* You have a good eye on the results that need to be achieved and you take corrective action when needed;
* An active, motivating attitude and strong collaboration skills;
* You are a connector who translates strategic change plans into execution and implementation.

**Conditions of employment**
----------------------------

**Additional information**


* Duration: 1 year for on average for 28 to 32 hours per week;
* Fee structure: Depending on experience and seniority, a rate of €80 – €100 per hour (excluding VAT) as a consultant;
* More information about our university and campus.

**Information and application**
-------------------------------

**About Eindhoven University of Technology**


TU/e is a leading Dutch university that educates students and advances knowledge in science and technology for the benefit of humankind. We strive to be an internationally leading academic institution pushing the boundaries of science and technology. We educate engineers of the future, who combine in-depth knowledge of technology with the skills to tackle global challenges. We create responsible innovations and contribute to societal challenges in close partnerships with society and industry. We have a strong and recognizable voice in the academic and public debate about technology and its impact on society. TU/e is a community of academics, support staff, students, and partners. People are the heart and soul of TU/e, so it is important to maintain the distinctive Eindhoven atmosphere and nurture a personal, welcoming, and vibrant environment that enables individuals and groups to grow professionally and personally.


**Interested**


Then we would like to receive your motivation and CV to substantiate your suitability for this interim assignment supplemented with an overview of your fee.


Please send these documents to Melloh Bröcheler (hrm.secretariat@tue.nl).
company_description: https://www.youtube.com/user/tueindhoven/featured

title: Senior Human Resources Business Partner
Technical Consultant PIM/MDM
description:
**De uitdaging**  

Veel bedrijven kampen met groeiende uitdagingen rondom een duidelijke ‘source of truth’ als het om hun data gaat. Vaak is er enorm veel data beschikbaar, hebben meerdere stakeholders toegang tot deze data en worden bedrijfskritische beslissingen genomen op basis van deze data. Om alle data componenten op een juiste manier met elkaar te verbinden, zodat je te allen tijden beschikt over de juiste data, is het hebben van één ‘source of truth’ belangrijk. En hierbij geldt vaak, hoe groter het bedrijf, hoe groter de moeilijkheidsgraad op dit gebied. Dit zorgt ervoor dat de grootste bedrijven in Nederland Squadra om hulp vragen.  

  

Bij de Squadra MDM Factory bouwen en ontwerpen we dit datafundament met behulp van de Master Data Management pakketten van onze partners. Of er nu een bestaand platform moet worden geoptimaliseerd of er vanuit een greenfield-project een oplossing wordt gecreëerd, wij ontwerpen en implementeren deze oplossingen. We werken in teams nauw samen met zowel de klant als mede-Squadrianen. Hierbij is een prettige werksfeer minstens zo belangrijk als het neerzetten van goede resultaten.  

  

**Dit ga je doen:**
* Implementeren en configureren van de oplossing in de Master Data Management (MDM) en Product Information Management (PIM) software van onze partners, waarbij je je kennis van deze MDM/PIM systemen benut om er het maximale voor de klant uit te halen. Door de complexe business processen van de klant is het begrijpen van datastromen en het schrijven van javascript code in dit onderdeel essentieel.
* Mogelijke oplossingen bedenken waar je een demo/proof of concept van bouwt. Je adviseert over de verschillende mogelijkheden, waarbij je de gekozen oplossing gedetailleerd specificeert.
* Het modelleren van datastructuren. Hierdoor worden er op gestructureerde manier producten beheerd en geoptimaliseerd.
* Je werkt aan het implementeren van integraties tussen het MDM/PIM systeem en externe systemen (ERP, Datapools, API’s, market places, etc). Hiervoor werk je nauw samen met verschillende teams van de klant, in een adviserende ondersteunende en/of uitvoerende rol.
* Het ontwikkelen van ‘tailor made’ dashboards voor de eindgebruiker.
* Delen van kennis en ‘best practices’ met de klant, key users en functioneel beheerders. Van tijd tot tijd geef je workshops, trainingen en zorg je voor een goede documentatie en overdracht.


  

**Wat neem je mee:**
* Je beschikt over een HBO/WO werk- en denkniveau, of vergelijkbare relevante werkervaring
* Minimaal twee jaar ervaring met Javascript of Python
* Ervaring met applicatiebeheer en het werken met databases en datastromen is (ook) een goede basis.
* Ervaring met PIM en/of MDM is gewenst. Heb je die ervaring nog niet? Geen probleem, dan leer je dit bij ons.
* Heb je ervaring bij een consultancy bedrijf is dat zeker een pre
* Je bent oplossingsgericht en hebt oog voor detail. Kwaliteit staat hoog bij je in het vaandel.
* Je hebt goede communicatieve vaardigheden, in zowel de Nederlandse als Engelse taal
* Je vindt het leuk om op locatie bij klanten te werken.

  

  

**Wat bieden wij jou?**


Je krijgt de vrijheid om - gebruikmakend van de applicaties en systemen waarmee we werken - je creativiteit in te zetten om mooie oplossingen te bedenken voor de klant. Naast een mooi salaris bieden we je in ieder geval:


* 25 vakantiedagen, met de optie om vakantiedagen bij te kopen
* 8% vakantiegeld
* Leaseauto
* Mogelijkheid om 32-40 uur te werken
* Macbook of Windows laptop naar keuze
* Telefoonvergoeding
* Bijdrage voor de oude dag (ten behoeve van een lijfrente polis)
* Jaarcontract met uitzicht op een vast contract na een jaar.
* Opleidingsmogelijkheden: we kennen veel manieren om onze collega’s te helpen met hun (persoonlijke) ontwikkeling bij Squadra. Zo kun je bijvoorbeeld trainingen volgen bij de verschillende Academies (bijv Stibo Step of Syndigo), events bezoeken, en werken we met een buddysysteem.
* Hybride werken


  

**Waarom wil je werken bij Squadra?**
* We zijn een kennisgedreven organisatie en daar zijn we trots op. Het is ons fundament en het verbindt onze mensen.
* Je hebt het familiaire gevoel van een klein bedrijf, maar je werkt met grote klanten. En we kennen geen interne politiek of bureaucratie, wel zo fijn!
* Kwaliteit leveren vinden we belangrijk, dat zie je terug in ons werk. Wij doen het liever ‘first time right’. Dit is ook een reden dat klanten graag met ons werken.
* Er is een verscheidenheid aan opdrachten en MDM pakketten waarmee we werken. Zo werken we veel met Stibo Step, en ook met Syndigo, Contentserv en SRC.
* Je krijgt ruimte om te leren en jezelf te ontwikkelen; denk bijvoorbeeld aan het volgen van trainingen en certificatie aan de Academy van Stibo Step of Syndigo, of een training om je engineer of consultancy skills te verbeteren of verdiepen. Als je bij ons start, word je gekoppeld aan een Squadra buddy en krijg je persoonlijke begeleiding van ons.
* Vanuit ons krijg je het volledige vertrouwen. Bij de klant ben jij het gezicht van Squadra.
* We werken hybride: op locatie bij de klant, vanuit huis of op ons kantoor in Leerdam/Utrecht.
* Squadra beslaat het hele spectrum van data diensten: van advies tot het bouwen van MDM/PIM oplossingen, Analytics, Machine Learning, Data Consultancy en e-Commerce oplossingen.


  

**Sollicitatieprocedure**
* Het eerste gesprek is met onze recruiter Irene. In een kort telefoongesprek (20 min) vertelt zij jou meer over de rol, Squadra en beantwoordt zij jouw vragen.


* Ben je enthousiast, dan plannen we een videogesprek in met jou, Hans Heutink (Managing director) en Irene (Recruiter); hier gaan we dieper in op jouw wensen, ervaring en ambities, en hoe Squadra hier aan kan bijdragen. En natuurlijk is er alle ruimte voor vragen.


* Het vervolggesprek is op kantoor of via video en zal met 2 collega’s van Squadra zijn; hierbij wordt dieper ingegaan op jouw ervaring en werkzaamheden, en kijken we of er een wederzijdse klik is.


* Daarna volgt een arbeidsvoorwaarden voorstel en bespreken we dat live of via de telefoon met je.



  

Ons proces duurt ongeveer 2-3 weken vanaf jouw sollicitatie tot het laatste gesprek, en de afspraken plant onze recruiter samen met jou in. Een van de gesprekken zal altijd een face-to-face gesprek zijn op kantoor, samen bepalen we hoe dit makkelijk te organiseren is.  

  

**Meer info & vragen**  

Wil je meer weten of de vacature of Squadra neem dan contact op met Hans Heutink via hans.heutink@squadra.nl (Managing Director) of met Irene via Irene.vanrosmalen@squadra.nl (Recruiter). Bellen of een whatsapp mag ook: 06-23470205 (Irene)  

  

**Over Squadra**  

Squadra staat voor Data Driven Value Creation. Al ruim 7 jaar helpen wij onze klanten met het oplossen van bedrijfskritische Master Data Management vraagstukken. En niet voor de minste klanten, we werken voor grote namen als Rituals, Etos, Hema, Sligro, Gall & Gall. We zijn er trots op dat we in ons relatief korte bestaan zoveel mooie merken aan ons verbonden hebben. Dat doen we samen, Squadra betekent immers ‘team’ in het Italiaans.  

  

*Voor W&S bureau's: wij waarderen jullie belangstelling om te helpen, maar willen vragen geen acquisitie te plegen n.a.v. deze vacature.*

title: Marketing Analytics Engineer
description:
Loopt jouw hart over van marketingtechnologie?


Als Marketing Analytics Engineer word je een belangrijke schakel in het groeiende Data & Intelligence-team. En da’s een nieuw team, dus jij krijgt zomaar even de kans om onze toekomst mee vorm te geven. Iets voor jou? Blijf dan zeker lezen!


Je zorgt ervoor dat de juiste data beschikbaar is om de organisatie/platform/marketing doelstellingen na te kunnen streven. Als deze doelstellingen er nog niet zijn, ondersteun je daar graag bij vanuit je expertise in.


Daarnaast zorg je er niet alleen voor dat de data in een mooi (door jou gebouwd) dashboard beschikbaar wordt, maar help je je stakeholders ook begrijpen wat er staat, hier gebruik je de maandelijkse rapportage momenten voor.


Jij bent dé verbinder tussen de data-analist, en de stakeholders aan klantzijde en snapt als geen ander wat de bezoeker/gebruiker nodig heeft om zijn doel te behalen.


Jij signaleert als eerste die drop in traffic of de conversie die achterblijft en komt pro-actief met verbetervoorstellen.


Je zit aan het stuur van het optimalisatie wiel. Dus het vertalen van het zien van de data, naar wat betekent dit, en welke invloed heeft dit op de KPI's, aan welke knoppen gaan we draaien om verder te optimaliseren? Of moeten we misschien wat kwalitatieve data inbrengen ter ondersteuning?


Je zoekt constant naar verbeteringen en innovaties die de klanten, maar ook iO, vooruit helpen.
  

Een enthousiast team van experts op vlak van marketing, technologie, content&creatie staat te springen om je te verwelkomen op campus Den Bosch.


Bij iO raak je nooit uitgeleerd. Je krijgt de ruimte om je eigen talent en ambitie te ontwikkelen en komt in een omgeving terecht waarin je continu wordt aangemoedigd om je kennis uit te breiden en deel te nemen aan inspirerende events. Zo geef je jouw persoonlijke groeipad invulling.


Wat je meebrengt als Marketing Analytics Engineer

* Je hebt minstens 3 jaar relevante werkervaring;
* Je hebt relevante ervaring binnen de digital Marketing & Sales;
* Je schrijft en spreekt vlot Nederlands; Engels is een must en een andere taal is een plus;
* Je hebt uitgebreide kennis van tools voor analytics of tag management (Google Analytics, GTM, Tealium, Adobe Launch, Piwik Pro etc.);
* Je kunt data inzichten goed visualiseren in een dashboard tools (Looker Studio, Power BI);
* Kennis van SQL, HTML en JavaScript zijn zeker welkom.


Over iO


iO is een **end-to-end agency** met experts in alle domeinen rond **marketing, creatie, strategie en technologie**. Iedere denkbare expertise in het creatieve en digitale domein is vertegenwoordigd om zo elke mogelijke vraag van onze klanten te kunnen beantwoorden. Dit doen we in lokale, hechte teams op campussen in België, Nederland, Zweden, Denemarken en Bulgarije. En dat voor de grootste merken in de Benelux én Europa.


Als werkgever zijn we ook **end-to-end betrokken bij je carrière**. We geven je de regie om jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen, in je vak en daarbuiten. Zo maak jij professioneel stappen.


Kortom: **wij ontzorgen, jij schittert**. Een win-win situatie, als je het ons vraagt.
company_description: We are iO - a growing team of experts thriving on curiosity and explores of all things new and exciting. We think big and work locally in strategy, creation, content, marketing & technology.

title: Sr. Product Owner Digital Services Platform
description:
**Job Description**

**Senior Product Owner Digital Services Platform**


Location: Eindhoven, the Netherlands

**The Mission**


Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. is the world leader in serving science, with annual revenue exceeding $40 billion. Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Whether our customers are accelerating life sciences research, solving sophisticated analytical challenges, improving patient diagnostics and therapies or growing efficiency in their laboratories, we are here to support them. Our distributed team of more than 100,000 colleagues delivers an outstanding combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience and pharmaceutical services through our industry-leading brands, including Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, Unity Lab Services and Patheon.

**The Position**


In the Digital Services Platform and Algorithms software development team within the Service Innovation organization we develop services that bring value on top of our Electron Microscopes. A key element of our service portfolio is our Digital Services Platform, for which we are looking for a Senior Product Owner to drive the development. This position requires someone who likes to take a self-propelling leading role, and is true networker with very good communication capabilities. You are expected to align well with colleagues from Marketing, Architects, Designers, R&D, Operations, Service Engineers and Customer Success Managers.


The team works in an agile environment where the SAFe and Scrum frameworks are applied. Together with your team members, you deliver services to our customers that helps them improve their operational efficiency and gain more control over their Electron Microscopes usage and health.

**Key responsibilities include, but are not exclusively:**

* Drive the roadmap for platform evolution and incorporate innovation activities for platform development
* Handle and communicate transparently the product backlog and its dependencies. Customer centric approaches to writing the user stories is stimulated.
* Translate customer, market and product requirements into meaningful development items, to bring services that delight our customers.
* Continuously balance the introduction of new features with continuous improvement and maintenance.
* Collect feedback about specific needs from collaborators and customers on a regular basis and use this information to drive continuous improvements for the services.
* Ensure that the team implements the required analytics to measure the key project metrics to make informed decisions
* Budgeting, reporting and supplier management for the flex capacity in your teams
* Team management (people management)
* Communicating across the company – Service, Engineering, R&D, Manufacturing and Marketing
* Evangelizing the developed products and increasing awareness of Digital Services.

**Requirements:**


The ideal candidate for this position enjoys working in a multi-disciplinary technical environment to address sophisticated problems. If you enjoy the development of valuable services and you have a keen eye towards customer needs, this is an excellent opportunity.

* Typically requires at least 5+ years in a software product owner or similar role.
* BSc or MSc in computer science, information technology or other relevant background.
* Experience or knowledge on cloud based and/or on premises based digital services platforms is a plus
* Concept & roadmap thinker with strong hands-on execution mentality
* Strong understanding of agile methodologies and product development processes.
* Excellent communication and scope clarification skills.
* Experience with a multisite and multidisciplinary environment.
* Open to occasional global travel.

**Competencies:**


The successful candidate will possess the following combination of education and experience:

* Creativity and innovation.
* Technical and functional expertise.
* Balance a good conceptual understanding with a pragmatic approach.
* Strong communicative skills verbally and in writing.
* Continuous quality & performance improvement.
* Customer centric approach.
* Clear and open communication.

**We offer:**


The opportunity to become a part of the fastest-growing division in our company, offering opportunities for career advancement and skill development. You will work in a modern work environment, where we offer flexibility in terms of working hours.

**Benefits:**

* Flexible working hours to better balance your personal life, and 40 (27+13) days of vacation per year.
* Annual bonus, 13th month, and a competitive pension scheme.
* Further benefits crafted to support your physical, financial and personal wellbeing.
company_description: At Thermo Fisher Scientific, our professionals develop critical solutions—and build rewarding careers.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Ben jij een technisch gedreven Data Engineer die klaar is om bij onze klanten te werken aan een datagedreven toekomst? Heb je een passie voor Data Engineering en zoek je uitdagende projecten om je vaardigheden verder te ontwikkelen? Sluit je dan aan bij **gaan>> consulting** en ontdek de mogelijkheden om als Data Engineer een verschil te maken.

**Wat ga je doen?**

Als Data Engineer bij **gaan>> consulting** ben je de technische expert die data-oplossingen ontwerpt, bouwt en optimaliseert. Je werkt met de nieuwste technologieën, schrijft efficiënte code en automatiseert processen. Je onderzoekt en implementeert de meest geschikte technologische tools voor het ontwikkelen van datawarehouses, datalakes en lakehouses.

**Wat heb je nodig?**

- Een afgeronde HBO- of WO-opleiding, bij voorkeur in IT of Data

- 2 tot 4 jaar relevante werkervaring

- Ervaring in (een of meer van) de volgende gebieden: SQL, Azure Data Factory, Fabric, Python, PowerBI, Synapse, Databricks, DAX en ETL/ELT processen

- Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels

- Sterk analytisch vermogen en precisie

- Beschikbaar voor 32-40 uur per week

**Wat bieden wij?**

- Een competitief salaris tussen €4.000,- en €8.000,- bruto per maand, afhankelijk van je ervaring;

- 25 vakantiedagen, met de mogelijkheid om 5 extra dagen bij te kopen;

- Een leaseauto die je ook privé mag gebruiken of een mobiliteitsvergoeding als je al een auto hebt;

- Begeleiding en coaching door ervaren professionals;

- Regelmatige teamsessies voor kennisdeling en uitwisseling van ervaringen bij klanten;

- Een telefoonvergoeding en een zakelijke laptop;

- Een thuiswerkpakket inclusief bureaustoel, beeldscherm en headset.

**Waar ga je werken?**

Bij **gaan>> consulting** bieden we toonaangevende oplossingen op het gebied van BI, Data & Analytics. Wij werken voor klanten als ASML, Heineken, AkzoNobel, PostNL, Nationale Nederlanden, Achmea, FrieslandCampina en vele andere bedrijven. Flexibiliteit en thuiswerken behoren tot de mogelijkheden, zodat we samen kunnen bepalen welke projecten het beste passen bij jouw ambities.

**Interesse?**

Ben je klaar om jouw talenten in te zetten bij **gaan>> consulting** en jezelf verder te ontwikkelen? Wij kijken ernaar uit! Voor meer informatie over de functie van Data Engineer neem je contact op met Eloy op 06-29576361 of mail je je cv en een korte profielbeschrijving naar info@gaanconsulting.nl.

Soort dienstverband: Fulltime

Salaris: €4.000,00 - €8.000,00 per maand

Flexibele taalvereiste:

* Nederlands niet vereist

Rooster:

* ma-vr

Secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden:

* Auto van de zaak
* Bedrijfsfeesten
* Extra vakantiedagen
* Pensioen
* Reiskostenvergoeding
* Telefoon van de zaak
* Werk vanuit huis

Soorten aanvullende vergoedingen:

* Bonusregeling
* Vakantiegeld

Opleiding:

* Bachelor (Gewenst)

Ervaring:

* data en analytics: 2 jaar (Vereist)

Werklocatie: Hybride werken in 2993 TP Barendrecht

title: Intelligent Automation Engineer
description:
We bieden je


NS Business card, ook privé te gebruiken


13e maand en vakantiegeld


27 vakantiedagen en 1 Diversiteitsdag


Hybride werken


Waarom NN Group


Meest menselijke corporate


Internationale werkomgeving


Support +20 miljoen klanten


Werken waar en wanneer jij wil


Snel naar:
Wat ga je doen?
Wat wij bieden
Je werkweek
Wat breng je mee
Je collega's
Je werkplek
introIn our young, international and energetic team of process automation experts, we might be looking for you! Are you a tech-minded and continuously improvement seeking person that wants to be part of NN Group's Intelligent Process Automation team? Then we need your help to support NN’s business units in increasing their efficiency, improving their processes and getting more digital. Come join our small diverse team and make the difference!At NN Group, the Process Management & Innovation team is discovering, implementing and using innovative ways to increase efficiency and optimize business processes in order to make NN’s operations better, faster and cheaper. Modern technologies like intelligent process automation, data analytics, data science and workflow automation are standard tools in your toolbox. Together, our efforts will fuel the transformation to a more digital, data-driven and engaged Finance community that continuously strives to deliver their services better, faster and cheaper.  


Wat ga je doen?


You will take responsibility for the compliant end-to-end delivery and support of our intelligent automations. From initiation (through designing a solution and selecting the right tool and approach) to develop, test, deliver and manage the automation.


Other responsibilities include:

* Act as a sparring partner for your fellow engineers in the domain of process automation
* Identify opportunities in digitization in the processes of our colleagues, and continuous improvement of our own way of working
* Relentlessly developing yourself into an all-round engineer


Wat wij jou bieden


NN invests in an inclusive, inspiring work environment and in skills and competences for the future. We match this with employee benefits that are in line with what is needed today and in the future. This way, we offer our employees the opportunity to get the best out of themselves. We offer you:

* Salary between €3.415 to €4.878 depending on your knowledge and experience
* 13th month and holiday allowance are paid with your monthly salary
* 27 vacation days for a 5-day working week and one Diversity Day
* A modern pension administered by BeFrank
* Plenty of training and learning opportunities
* NS Business Card 2nd class, which gives you unlimited travel, also privately. Do you prefer to travel with your own transport? Then you can declare the kilometres travelled
* Allowances for setting up your home office and for internet use


Wat je meebrengt


We are looking for someone with a couple of years of experience in process automation using UiPath preferably with a consultancy and/or insurance industry background. You also have a proactive attitude, you are a self-starter and you have analytical and problem solving skills.

* You have a bachelor or Master in (Business) Information management, computer science or similar
* You have at least 1.5 year experience in Robotic Process Automation with UiPath
* You have affinity with automation, scripting and developing software. Preferably you have experience with: C#, Microsoft Azure, Python
* You have a natural tendency to be an entrepreneur, a self-starter and to challenge the status quo. you are eager to work with and adapt to different cultures
* You are a creative thinker and have a hands-on mentality that gets things done


As an Intelligent Process Automation Engineer your personal qualities will play a decisive role.

  



Carolina Remzetti
Talent Acquisition Specialist Tech & Data  


Wat gebeurt er na je sollicitatie?


1
Je solliciteert
Jouw CV en motivatie worden door de Talent Acquisition Specialist en manager bekeken. Je ontvangt een reactie binnen twee weken.


2
Interview(s) en online assesment
We streven ernaar binnen een week het eerste gesprek in te plannen. Voorafgaand aan je tweede gesprek vragen we je een online assesment te maken.


3
Aanbod
Zijn we een match? Dan ontvang je van ons direct een aanbieding. De Talent Acquisition Specialist loopt samen met jou het aanbod door.


4
Welkom bij NN
Aanbieding geaccepteerd? Gefeliciteerd! Om alles ook administratief goed te regelen starten we de pre-employment screening en sturen we jouw arbeidsovereenkomst toe.

company_description: NN Group is a financial services company. It is our purpose to help people care for what matters most to them.

title: Financial Reporting Analyst
description:
**Who is Infinitas Learning?**



Infinitas Learning is a dynamic educational resources company, and one of Europe's leading providers of innovative and engaging products and services for teaching and learning. At Infinitas we are passionate about transforming the way people learn. We aim to deliver flexible, market-leading solutions that support new approaches to learning for the 21st century. The Infinitas Learning group includes Liber (Sweden), Noordhoff (The Netherlands), Plantyn (Belgium) and Leya (Portugal) as well as Infinitas Product & Technology (The Netherlands). The group employs around 600 people and is headquartered in Utrecht (The Netherlands).

 **The role**



Are you an analytical talent with a passion for data and affinity with financial reporting?



As a Financial Reporting Analyst at Infinitas Learning, you will be part of a centralized Data & Insights team. Our role as the central team is to identify business problems worth solving, that need solving, and tackle them by utilizing, combining, and analyzing existing source data from systems such as Netsuite and SAP BPC. This enables the business and customers to make better (data-driven) decisions more quickly and with greater confidence. We operate across a broad variety of domains such as finance, operations, commercial, learning didactics, and platform usage.

  

As a Financial Reporting Analyst, you will focus on turning financial data into valuable insights and reports for different stakeholders within Infinitas. Focus is on reports like the Income Statement, Balance Sheet, Cash flow and all kind of reports related to the order and sales process. With your expertise in data and finance you will manage various initiatives, ensuring the delivery of project milestones within the agreed timeframe and quality standards.

 **What you will do**


* Design, build and deliver accurate and fast analytical reporting and dashboards using Microsoft Power BI fed from the data marts
* You will test and ensure the data quality and documentation of financial data products that our team creates and ensure uniformity and consistency across reports.
* Work closely with various stakeholders within the financial domain to identify areas where Data & Insights can be used to improve business processes and operation.
* You are able to act as a sparring partner for the finance team and are excellent at reconciling data with financials from source systems such as Netsuite and SAP BPC
* Utilize a strong business acumen to identify and develop analytical use-cases with high value together with various stakeholders within the financial domain.
* Ensure optimal performance to maximize the use of the Power BI functionality. Excel in designing data models to best practices including use of complex DAX-calculations, making use of conformed dimensions and striving to push business logic to the data marts.
* Work in close cooperation with Analytical Engineers to give feedback regarding necessary design changes on data models and missing data.
* Communicate, document, and present the use of our analytical tools to peers and different stakeholders throughout the organization.
* Constantly stay up to date on new technologies in the analytical reporting, dashboards, and visualization space and where they may fit our initiatives.

 **Who you are**


* Enjoy working in a fast-paced environment handling multiple activities simultaneously. Exercise business judgment and make sound decisions under pressure.
* Take initiative, are transparent, and deliver high-quality results. We take it for granted that you are responsible, and solutions oriented.
* An analytical, innovative, and structured problem solver with a passion to make data analysis a business asset by enabling value.
* Keen interest in improving financial reporting
* Recognize the importance of working as one team and can identify and develop talent. You thrive when developing people, not just products. Giving and receiving feedback is a natural part of your everyday work.
* Appreciate working with international colleagues and distributed teams.
* A curious and life-long learner with a keen interest in the evolution of analytical reporting and visualization techniques.


**What experience you must have to qualify as a candidate**

  

* Bachelor’s degree in either Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Data Science or Computer Science with a strong financial related component or a Bachelor’s degree in Accountancy, or Business Economics with a strong data component.
* Minimum of 2 years of experience in data analytics and/or financial reporting: maintenance and support of analytical financial reports and dashboards.
* Designed, developed, tested, and supported analytical reporting and dashboards using Power BI. Experience programming in complex DAX calculations.
* Excellent English written and oral communication skills.
* Fluent in Dutch or Swedish is preferred.
* Working permit within the European Union.
* Can work regularly at one of our office locations Antwerpen/Stockholm/Utrecht/Groningen

 **What Infinitas Learning offers you**

  


* Competitive salary.
* Attractive and flexible employment conditions.
* Flexible working hours depending on team requirements as to how, where, and when you work.
* A job with a real purpose where you really contribute to society.

  

Applications are being reviewed on an ongoing basis. In case of any questions please feel free to reach out to Casper Fransz.
  

Please apply via https://careers.infinitaslearning.com. Applications via LinkedIn, direct messages, or mail will not be reviewed.

title: Senior Google Cloud Engineer
description:
- If you like these keywords you’ll love this role:


#coding #cloud #containers #K8S #linux


Our mission is to build cultures of innovation at companies by transforming the way they work, by modernising their IT infrastructure & apps, and by elevating their customer experiences. As a Premier Google Cloud partner, we do this by implementing innovative Google Cloud solutions and by leveraging cutting-edge AI & Machine Learning technologies.
  

  

Devoteam G Cloud’s certified Cloud engineers build disruptive solutions on Google Cloud Platform to give organisations a competitive advantage. We migrate and modernise legacy applications & IT infrastructure using Cloud Native solutions such as Kubernetes, Anthos and Serverless solutions.
  

  

We help our customers with their hybrid- and multi-Cloud strategies and to get to actionable business insights faster, by accelerating their data & analytics. Together we create scalable, future-proof & secure data journeys. And we build AI & ML solutions on top of this data to help customers to create better customer experiences. Next to that, we give the workplace of the future shape with solutions like Google Workspace.

  
With a team of Cloud Architects, Google Cloud infrastructure Engineers and Software Engineers you will work on implementing infrastructures as well as migration projects to facilitate and accelerate customer solutions on Google Cloud. You will engineer the aforementioned solutions based on given requirements and best practices while you are not afraid to challenge bad practice and provide alternatives when necessary.


  
* [Must-have] Fluency in and deep understanding of at least one programming language.
* [Must-have] Can set up all the requirements for a container orchestration cluster in code.
* [Must-have] Can set up CI/CD and GitOps in code.
* [Must-have] Has an understanding of a wide range of cloud services and their interactions.
* [Nice-to-have] Experience with Google Cloud Platform

**What we have to offer:**

* An exciting job where innovation in technology is not a buzzword but a reality.
* Continuous training & development of soft- and hard skills, including training at several Google locations.
* A competitive salary, in line with your profile.
* Additional benefits.
* An awesome team of colleagues & regular team building activities.
* A "Googley" well-equipped office in Amsterdam.
* The ability to work with the world’s leading companies in technology and innovation.
* Hybrid way of working. Working remotely 4 weeks a year.

If you do not feel fully confident that you meet the requirements above, please don’t worry. Just apply. Together we’ll discover what you can bring to the table, in which role you would fit best and how you could potentially grow at Devoteam. We are looking for different levels of seniority.
  

  

**Any questions? Please contact Lyubomira Nikolova at lyubomira.nikolova@devoteam.com**


  
- #techies in our minds, #creatives in our hearts, #change in our DNA.
  

You’ll be part of a bunch of Tech Enthusiasts in a fail-safe culture where everyone, from bright talents to experienced rockstars, is encouraged to continuously innovate and grow. We are a community that is proud of who you are and helps you to become who you want to be. Our dietary constraints: we’re allergic to unnecessary hierarchies and excessive processes. At Devoteam, the only constant is change.
  

  

We drive change & bring creative tech ideas to life for our customers. We do this with 10.000+ business & tech experts EMEA-wide. Our multidisciplinary teams play on the edge of technological innovation and help leading companies to unlock the future. Our award-winning EMEA partnerships with Microsoft, Salesforce, Google, AWS & ServiceNow, enable us to deliver remarkable solutions and empower your career path. Next to these EMEA partnerships we also partner locally with key tech innovators such as Elastic, Atlassian & Red Hat.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.
